summary: AN ORDINANCE making an appropriation from the Park Acquisition and Development Fund for administrative expenses in connection with the acquisition of certain property in Blocks 449 and 452, Seattle Tidelands, and Blocks 449-A and 452-A, Seattle Tidelands Extension No. 1 (Don Armeni Extension South), for permanent open space for recreational and scenic purposes and ratifying prior expenditures in connection therewith.
